# Lux Exchange

> Decentralized exchange for trading, liquidity pools, and token swaps on Lux Network.

## About
Lux Exchange is a decentralized exchange (DEX) built on Lux Network. It provides token swaps, liquidity pools, limit orders, and advanced trading features with sub-second settlement. The exchange leverages Lux Network's high throughput and post-quantum security for fast, secure, and low-cost trading.

## Key Features
- Instant token swaps with minimal slippage
- Automated market maker (AMM) liquidity pools
- Limit orders and advanced order types
- Sub-second trade settlement
- Low transaction fees on Lux Network
- Cross-chain token trading via B-Chain bridge
- Liquidity provider rewards and fee sharing
- Portfolio tracking and trade history
- Post-quantum secure transactions
- No KYC required for decentralized trading

- [Website](https://lux.exchange)

- Swap API: https://api.lux.exchange
- Docs: https://docs.lux.network/exchange/api
